bill_title: provide for the reimbursement of persons who paid certain deductibles associated with tank removal or corrective action for petroleum releases.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the reimbursement of persons who paid certain deductibles associated with tank removal or corrective action for petroleum releases. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34A-13 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, any person who has paid any deductible that was required by the provisions of this chapter and associated with any corrective action or tank pulling may be reimbursed from the fund for the amount of the deductible if the corrective action or tank pulling was initiated before July 1, 2000. Each fiscal year, the total amount of such reimbursements shall be at least nine hundred thousand dollars for the fiscal year, unless all claims for such reimbursement have been settled. The director may pay additional amounts for reimbursement in a fiscal year if money is available in the fund. The director shall make reimbursements from the fund on a first in time basis. The board shall promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 to specify criteria, methods, and procedures to qualify, apply for, and receive the reimbursement and to administer the reimbursement program. Section 2. This Act is repealed on June 30, 2013.
